title: Dillon Danis 'offered $5million to fight Jake Paul' amid Logan and KSI beef
text:
‘And then the money came in to part and I was like “Maybe I’ll just shut this motherf***er up”‘.

He added to ESPN: ‘So I’ve been thinking about it lately and I’m down to do it, they’re offering me $4-$5 million (£3-3.8 million) for a boxing fight against some p***y that can’t even defend himself.’

Dillon claimed Jake told him that he, Deji, KSI and Logan made $8 million (£6 million) for their previous fight and undercard.

Meanwhile, the 26-year-old recently called out Logan online after the YouTuber asked ‘Who’s Dillon?’

‘I’ll knockout you and jake in the same night send me the contract p***y,’ he wrote, clearly not mincing his words.

However, Dillon might have to get in line, after KSI promised to ‘break Jake’s face’ following his rematch with Logan on 9 November.

Jake (R) wants in on Logan and KSI’s fight (Picture: Jake and Logan Paul/ YouTube)

‘I would love to break Jake’s face as well as Logan’s. I personally don’t think, as soon as I knock out Logan, I don’t think he’s gonna want to fight me,’ he told TMZ.

‘I think he’s gonna see that and be afraid and just be like, “Yo, actually, I don’t know if this whole boxing thing is for me”.’

Meanwhile, Jake previously pleaded with Eddie Hearn to let him be part of the Logan and KSI match, addressing him directly in a video.

‘Eddie, people want to watch me fight,’ he explained. ‘I have a different demographic than KSI and Logan, their audiences are older and more mature. I come from Disney, I have the families, the younger kids.’
